bakeWaffleLayer(uint256).notice: Add a new layer to the waffleId provided if the waffle is owned by the sender and if last   layer has been customized*

concludeCompetition().notice: Call this to conclude the competition and distribute the rewards to the owner   of the waffle with the most votes*

getCompetitionEndTimestamp().notice: See the timestamp at which the competition will end and concludeCompetition()   can be called by anyone to distribute the reward*
